OOC: Why would I even dignify the Boogerman post with a response?  
It's even dumber than that Terminion+co. horseradish was.

But you're right on one thing: Tankor moded, end of story.  After 
all, it WAS pointed out to him at least once during the battle that 
people were shooting at his characters.  There is no excuse for 
missing both the attack post and the reminder(s).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator" <hollywood.narrator@v...> 
wrote:
> OOC: Hi.
> 
> BIC: Boogerman explodes.
> 
> OOC: It wasn't a good game anyway. Anyway, here I am, back once 
more. Crawling back has become typical of me. Well, this time I'm 
back for a few reasons. They are below if any of you want to read. I 
doubt you do, but this is my post and I will type what I want to.
> 
> 1: nWo is 4 life.
> 
> 2: Azure wrote me this pretty little letter and cheered me up.
> 
> 3: Rudra didn't respond to my teasing RPG posts and I wasn't having 
fun anymore.
> 
> 4: Cardhead didn't reply to the Boogerman post. Thanks, buddy!
> 
> 5: Saliva's "Always" is awesome. That's not a reason, but I believe 
it to be fact.
> 
> 6: This RPG can't live without me. Don't say it can, because I like 
to think it can't. Shut up.
> 
> 7: Wrestlers shouldn't get so mad. If I got any madder I'd be like 
HHH, and that's definitely not a good thing. I have to make it to 
reason 8 I can say I have a Megaman total. (GEEK ALERT)
> 
> 8: I like wasting the time of the innocent with worthless posts 
like these. Yeah, I wasted your time if you read down this far. Oh, 
not quite. There's a reward for your patience provided you did not 
click delete as you read this. It's 1 million dollars plus a bomb. 
Oh, never mind. I'm sorry, people, this post was my cry for 
attention! It's because I don't know how to say that NBW is part of 
who I am now, despite all of the random outbursts of rage. Oops, I 
guess I just did. I'm high on no-sleep right now, forgive this shit. 
Thanks.
> 
> Mr. Mister Zeeryo
